docs.title: Test API
docs.text:
Test API is a lightweight REST service used to demonstrate documentation, deployment workflows, and project structure best practices.

It is intentionally simple and designed for learning, testing, and demonstration purposes.

docs.title: ✨ Features
docs.text:
• Create test resources
  • Retrieve resources
  • Update resources
  • Delete resources
  • Filter by status

docs.title: Architecture
docs.text: Test API follows a standard layered architecture pattern.

docs.title: 1️⃣ Controller Layer
docs.text:
• Handles HTTP requests
  • Performs request validation
  • Maps endpoints to service calls

docs.title: 2️⃣ Service Layer
docs.text:
• Contains business logic
  • Coordinates repository operations
  • Handles domain rules

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: This guide walks you through running Test API locally.
